The Tabulate Area tool calculates the cross-tabulated areas between two datasets and reports the results as a table.

The input that defines the boundaries of the zones.

For feature inputs, the count depends on additional factors such as filtering criteria and the analysis extent.

The field that contains the values that define each zone.

The input that defines the boundaries of the classes whose area will be calculated.

For feature inputs, the count depends on additional factors such as filtering criteria and the analysis extent.

The field that contains the values that define each class.

Specifies whether the values from the input class raster will be represented as rows in the output table.

If unchecked, classes will be represented as fields. If checked, classes will be represented as rows.

Specifies the cell size of the analysis raster that will be created to calculate the cross-tabulated areas.

The name of the tabulated area table layer that will be created and added to the map.

The name of the folder in My content where the result will be saved.
